subject: Inner Class, Even Driven Classes
msgSnippet: Hello I have just started using JUnit. I have a few queries. 1. How do I handle inner classes ? If I have a class A and this has three inner classes A1, A2, A3
messageBody:
Hello
I have just started using JUnit.
I have a few queries.

1. How do I handle inner classes ?
If I have a class A and this has three inner classes A1, A2, A3 ;
Should I write separate test classes for each of these inner
classes ? (Atest, A1test, A2test, A3test)
OR should I write just write one test class( TestA) that
will handle the functions in the inner classes also ?

2. I am trying to write test classes for an event driven program. How
feasible is this ?

Thanks

Sowmya
